6.60: Aghanim's Scepter no longer increases  Chain Frost number of bounces from 7 to 8.
6.67: Reduced  Frost Blast cooldown from 9.25 on each level to 9.25/9.25/9.25/8. Fixed a damage interaction between  Ice Armor and  Return.
6.45: Ice Armor Increased armor bonus from 2/4/6/8 to 3/6/9/12. Increased duration from 25 to 40. Reduced manacost from 50 to 25.  Aghanim's Scepter now also increases  Chain Frost number of bounces from 6 to 7.
6.68: Increased movement speed from 305 to 315. Rescaled base attack damage from 19-38 to 24-33 (total attack damage is now 42-51).
6.04: Reduced attack range from 600 to 570. Increased  Frost Blast manacost from 100/125/155/180 to 125/150/170/190.
6.49: Increased attack range from 500 to 550. Increased base attack damage from 19-31 to 19-38 (total attack damage is now 37-56).
6.09b: Fixed a rare  Chain Frost bug.
6.31: Fixed  Ice Armor slowing  Leshrac/ Beastmaster when damaging the armored unit with  Diabolic Edict/ Wild Axes.
6.32: Fixed  Chain Frost bouncing off of  Death Wards.
6.34: Reduced  Chain Frost cast range from 800 to 750.  Aghanim's Scepter now also increases  Chain Frost cast range from 750 to 850.
6.36: Increased  Sacrifice cooldown from 45 on each level to 60/55/50/45.
6.72d: Chain Frost Now follows its target and jumps upon reaching it, instead of flying to its target's position upon projectile launch. Increased projectile speed from 522 to 675.
6.19: Reduced base  intelligence from 20 to 18. Fixed a rare  Chain Frost bug which created a global ranged Nova casting dummy.
6.79: Ice Armor Now has half effect against ranged units, instead of no effect. Slow now stacks with the slow from  Frost Blast.  Sacrifice: Increased cooldown from 35/30/25/20 to 44/36/28/20. Increased current health as mana from 15%/30%/45%/60% to 25%/40%/55%/70%. No longer denies experience for the enemy. Now converts the creep for experience (shared with all heroes within the normal experience radius).
6.78: Increased  Chain Frost number of bounces from 7 to 10.
6.50: Increased  Chain Frost number of bounces from 6 ( 7) to 7 ( 8).
6.75: Reduced  Frost Blast cooldown from 9.25/9.25/9.25/8 to 8 on each level.
6.70: Increased  Frost Blast primary target damage from 50/100/125/175 to 50/100/150/200.  Ice Armor Reduced armor bonus from 3/6/9/12 to 3/5/7/9. Increased manacost from 25 to 50. Reduced  Sacrifice cooldown from 55/50/45/40 to 30/27/24/21.
6.73: Chain Frost now bounces in 0.2 second intervals, instead of instantly.
6.81: Ice Armor can now be cast on buildings.  Aghanim's Scepter now removes  Chain Frost's bounce limit.
6.82: Ice Armor Now has full effect against ranged units, instead of half. Can now be cast on spell immune allies.
6.83: Reduced  Chain Frost cooldown from 145/115/60 to 120/90/60.
6.84: Increased  Ice Armor cast range from 800 to 1000. Increased  Chain Frost projectile speed from 675 to 750.
6.20: Increased movement speed from 280 to 295.  Sacrifice can no longer kill couriers. Reduced  Chain Frost number of bounces from 7 to 6.
